word_mean: 光所致的，光原性的：由光所引起的，如光原性癫痫
发光的：发出光的，磷光的

sentence.Network_en: I've got a million photos of my boy. He's very photogenic.
sentence.Network_cn: 我给儿子拍了好多照片，他非常上镜。

sentence.Network_en: Then came the gulf disaster. Suddenly, environmental destruction was photogenic again.
sentence.Network_cn: 就在这时海湾灾难发生了. 忽然之间, 对环境的破坏重新成了电视聚焦点.

entry.def: Someone who is photogenic looks nice in photographs.

example.ex: I've got a million photos of my boy. He's very photogenic.
example.tran: 我给儿子拍了好多照片，他非常上镜。

auth_sentence.content: Part of all this has to do with being photogenic.
auth_sentence.res_content: Part of all this has to do with being photogenic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Part of all this has to do with being photogenic.

auth_sentence.content: However an abandoned town is not particularly photogenic.
auth_sentence.res_content: However an abandoned town is not particularly photogenic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However an abandoned town is not particularly photogenic.

auth_sentence.content: Clinical descriptions of photogenic epilepsy are few.
auth_sentence.res_content: Clinical descriptions of photogenic epilepsy are few.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Clinical descriptions of photogenic epilepsy are few.

stems_affixes.word_buile: photo光+gen产生+ic表形容词→产生光的
photo光+gen产生+ic表形容词→产生光的
photo光+phob厌恶,恨+ia病→n.光恐怖, 恐光症
photo光+synthesis合成→光的综合→光合作用
